ActivationDate.description: The date on which service was started at this location.

BusinessHoursId.description: The Business Hours object associated with the Location

DistributionArea.description: The electricity, gas, or water distribution area this location belongs to.

GrossFloorArea.description: The value of the sum of the floor area of the spaces within the location

GrossFloorAreaUom.description: Specifies the unit of measure for Gross Floor Area of the location

HasLifeSupport.description: Indicates whether the location has life-support equipment.

HasSensitiveLoad.description: Indicates whether the location has sensitive load equipment.

IsKeyAtPremises.description: Indicates whether the key is available at the location

IsOkToEnter.description: Indicates whether the field service representative has permission to enter the location

IsSupplyGuaranteed.description: Indicates whether supply is guaranteed at the location

MeterReadInstructions.description: The instructions for the field service representative on where to find the meter in this location

MeterReadWarning.description: The warnings for the field service representative of potentially dangerous situations or conditions at this location

NumberOfOccupants.description: The number of occupants at this location.

PrimaryPropertyFunction.description: Specifies the primary use of the location

PropertyOwnerAccountId.description: The Account object associated with the Location

Status.description: Specifies the status of the location.

SupplyGuaranteeReason.description: The reason for which supply is guaranteed at the location

IsInventoryLocation.description: Indicates whether the location stores parts. This field must be selected if you want to associate the location with product items.

IsMobile.description: Indicates whether the location moves. For example, a truck or tool box.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when the location was last modified. Its label in the user interface is Last Modified Date.

LastViewedDate.description: The date the location was last viewed.

LocationType.description: Picklist of location types. It has no default values, so you must populate it before creating any location records.

LogoId.description: A ContentAsset representing a logo for the location.

Name.description: The name of the location. For example, Service Van #4.

RootLocationId.description: (Read Only) The top-level location in the location’s hierarchy.
